Package com.koucha.experimentalgame.rendering

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Renderable
    Can be rendered by a Renderer
    Renderer
    Takes care of creating a window, provides functionality to render Renderable objects to this window and forwards the input received by the Window to a InputBridge A minimal setup should always have the form: try{ renderer.init(); // create window and do your stuff here, // exit try block only if program ends } finally{ renderer.cleanUp(); }
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Line
    Represents a Line that can be rendered
    Rectangle
    Represents a Rectangle that can be rendered
    Text
    Represents a Text that can be rendered
